context_of_use: The customer wants to track their orders to know the delivery status.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: To receive timely updates on order status.
description: This use case allows the customer to view order status and shipment tracking information until delivery.
triggering_event: The customer initiates a request to track their order.
preconditions: The customer has placed an order.
The customer is logged into their account.
postconditions: The customer receives the current status of their order.
The customer can view tracking information.
assumptions: The customer has access to the internet.
The order tracking system is operational.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to track their orders.
The system shall provide real-time updates on order status.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the frequency of status updates provided to the customer.
main_flow: 1. The customer requests to track their order → The system retrieves the order status.
2. The system displays the current status of the order → The customer views the order status.
3. The system provides tracking information → The customer views the tracking details.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 1): If the order cannot be found, the system displays an error message indicating the order is not available.
